dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 730 IH: Equal Protection in Travel Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Amash (for himself, Mr. Conyers, Mr. Massie, and Mrs. Dingell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to remove limitations on the ability of certain dual citizens from participating in the Visa Waiver Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Equal Protection in Travel Act of 2017.

section.header: Removal of limitations of certain dual citizens from participating in the Visa Waiver Program
section.text: Section 217(a)(12) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1187(a)(12)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking in subparagraphs (B) and (C)— and inserting in subparagraphs (B) and (C), the alien has not been present, at any time on or after March 1, 2011—;
in subclause (III) of clause (i), by striking ; and at the end and inserting a period;
in clause (i), by striking the matter preceding subclause (I);
by redesignating subclauses (I), (II), and (III) of clause (i) as clauses (i), (ii), and (iii); and

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B), in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking (A)(i) and inserting (A).
